messages.subject: Indigo Children
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow unschoolers, Yesturday I was told that my son is an Indigo Child. While the term was vaguely familiar (there goes that mommy brain) I took
messages.messageBody:
Greetings fellow unschoolers,

Yesturday I was told that my son is an Indigo Child. While the term was
vaguely familiar (there goes that mommy brain) I took some time to
research it on the web.

I was very interested to see that a lot of learning disabilities, ADD
(AHD?) people are really misunderstood Indigos. A lot of it made sense,
since the LDs are being more and more diagnosed.

I sincerely commend all of you unschoolers, no matter what method you
choose to unschool. We are the future for radical change in educational
methods.

Blessed be,
Kolleen

http://www.metagifted.org/topics/metagifted/indigo/introduction.html
http://www.greatdreams.com/indigo.htm
